note: fn argon2d_password_generator(password_length: u32) -> String {  let mut rng = rand::thread_rng();  let salt: [u8; 32] = rng.gen();  let config = Config::default();  let mut password = String::new();  for _ in 0..password_length {  let random_char = (rng.gen::<u8>() % 94 + 33) as char;  password.push(random_char);  }  let hashed_password = argon2::hash_encoded(password.as_bytes(), &salt, &config, ThreadMode::Single).unwrap();  hashed_password }
